Description:
Clinker Brick Beauty in the Golf Links Estate
With its storybook good looks, superior Golf Links Estate position and panoramic views of the Mt Dandenong Ranges, this charming clinker brick beauty will instantly enchant.
Built around 1946, it stands as a stunning reminder of the quality and detail our homes of yesteryear encompassed; with high ceilings, picture rails and sash windows injecting character throughout.
Possessing a smart tri-level layout plus plenty of scope to add your own personal touches, it boasts a living zone and bedroom on each floor plus an excellent connection to the outdoors.
Entering via a sunny north-facing patio, the main level comprises a large lounge with spectacular bay window vistas, a country-style kitchen with stainless steel appliances and timber benchtops, master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling built-in wardrobes plus a classy central bathroom with shower over bathtub, timber vanity and toilet.
Downstairs, a light-filled family room is flanked by a second bedroom and combined second bathroom/laundry and enjoys French door access out to the well-established gardens for effortless indoor-outdoor enjoyment.
Upstairs, a third bedroom is located off a spacious open rumpus/optional fourth bedroom and boasts the home's most magnificent hills views.
Extras include: gas heating, air conditioning, heaps of storage nooks, a water tank, shed plus a gated driveway with double carport.
Its coveted location reaches buses and reserves on foot. Only a short drive to schools plus the popular shops, eateries and train stations of Croydon and Mooroolbark.
* Charming clinker brick beauty in the coveted Golf Links Estate
* Possessing the character of yesteryear plus plenty of scope to add your own personal touches
* Three living zones and bedrooms set over three levels - the upstairs rumpus doubling as an optional fourth bedroom
* Country-style kitchen with stainless steel appliances and timber benchtops
* Two bathrooms, well-established gardens plus a glorious north-facing patio
* Heating and air conditioning
* Gated driveway with double carport
* Located close to buses, reserves, schools plus the popular shops, eateries and train stations of Croydon and Mooroolbark
10% deposit, balance in 120/150 days
